#  Tax Information 

IRS FORMS 8937

These forms have been made available pursuant to IRS guidance. Veritex Holdings, Inc. and Veritex Bank do not provide tax advice to external parties. Please contact your personal tax advisor for further clarification and application of this information to your particular tax circumstances.

#  Shareholder meeting 

**Proxy Materials** A meeting of shareholders of Veritex Holdings, Inc. will be held on May 15, 2024 at 10:00 a.m. Central Time, at our corporate offices located at 8214 Westchester Drive, 7th Floor Dallas, Texas 75225.

Shareholders who held shares of our common stock, $.01 par value, as of close of business on March 28, 2024, the record date, will be entitled to vote their shares at the annual meeting of shareholders.

Proxy Materials for the annual meeting of shareholders: 

[Sample Proxy Card](/static-files/e10af358-6f7c-4373-9cc5-d589fb589364)

[Proxy Statement](/static-files/ec212152-1d7b-421f-9e5e-b66d2ae7579e)

## VOTE YOUR PROXY

Click [here](http://www.cstproxyvote.com/) to enter your control number and vote your shares.

**Shareholders of Record:** You are a “shareholder of record” if on the record date you held your shares in your own name with our transfer agent, Continental Stock Transfer and Trust Company. 

You should have received from Continental Stock Transfer and Trust Company the following: (i) Proxy Statement (ii) a proxy card, and (iii) a prepaid-postage mailing envelope.

Please follow the instructions on the proxy card and complete, date, sign and return the proxy card in the postage-prepaid envelope included with the proxy materials from Continental Stock Transfer and Trust Company or vote by internet as instructed on the proxy card.

**Beneficial Shareholders:** You are a “beneficial shareholder” if on the record date you held your shares through a broker, bank or other nominee. Beneficial shareholders are also referred to as owning their shares in “street name.”

You should have received from your broker, bank or other nominee (i) Proxy Statement and (ii) a voting instruction form.

In order to vote your shares, you will need the control number(s) printed on the voting instruction form(s) you received.
